function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Temporary closure of secondary public places","Impact":"Reduced accessibility to non-essential public areas","Mitigation":"Ensuring provision of alternative essential services in primary public areas","Technologies":"Not specified","People":"General public","Owner":"Local authorities"},{"Description":"Provision of community-level designated zones","Impact":"Concentration of people in specific areas leading to higher risk","Mitigation":"Strict monitoring and control of activities in designated zones","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, crowd-monitoring technologies","People":"Community members","Owner":"Community leaders or local authorities"},{"Description":"Temporary regulations in public places","Impact":"Disruption of normal social activities and interactions","Mitigation":"Enforcement of temporary regulations, promotion of virtual alternatives","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, communication platforms for virtual gatherings","People":"General public","Owner":"Local authorities"}]}
